Exum, Jr. The challengers believe the evidence will show Mr. Cawthorn to be one of those persons.? title: Bid to erase Marjorie Taylor Greene from ballot fails

sentence: Saul Loeb/Pool via REUTERS/File Photo WASHINGTON, May 5 (Reuters) - A grainy 28-second video showing a naked young man gyrating against someone in bed amid squeals and laughter was the latest in a string of episodes that has turned Republicans against one of their own: the brash U.S. Representative Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina.
author: David Morgan
title: Nude video latest scandal turning Republicans against U.S. Rep. Cawthorn

sentence: Sharing Local since 2011 North Carolina's 11th Congressional District election, 2022 (May 17 Democratic primary) Elections in North Carolina, 2022 Primary date: May 17, 2022 Early voting starts: April 28, 2022 Early voting ends: May 14, 2022 Poll times: 6:30 a.m. to 7:30 p.m. Absentee/mail-in voting deadline: May 17, 2022 Madison Cawthorn May Have a New Ethics Violation to Handle Daily Beast, Roger Sollenberger, 5/5/2022 Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-NC) has been embroiled in scandal after scandal.
title: DKos Asheville Open Thread: Cawthorn Roundup, yee haw!

sentence: Details about the incident are emerging soon after U.S. Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.) was cited for having a gun in a carry-on bag.
author: Patrick Marley
title: Congressional candidate Derrick Van Orden fined for having a loaded gun in an airport. He calls the incident a mistake.

sentence: The Washington Post: Inside the Republican campaign to take down Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.).
author: Alexis Simendinger
title: The Hill's Morning Report  Biden talks inflation; House helps Ukraine

sentence: Hines, a 26-year-old former college football recruit often compared to Representative Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina before Cawthorn's recent string of troubles, is running for a U.S. House seat representing the exurban area just south of Raleigh.
title: Can Donald Trump Get This 26-Year-Old Elected to Congress?

sentence: North Carolina Republican Representative Madison Cawthorn on Wednesday morning posted on Twitter that instead of providing financial help to Ukrainians as they fight against the Russian invasion of their country, the money should be spent stateside.
author: Adam Staten
title: Madison Cawthorn Slammed for Suggesting Ukraine Aid Be Spent on Veterans
